author: ajsutton
content: I couldn't face staying up all night for the call night so sorry to rehash discussion, but is there a reason we're not just moving to kilnv2? This will make four separate engine API versions we're supporting in Teku and its getting pretty ridiculous. And it just makes it even harder to match up with the right branch/version of the EL client to support the particular variant of the engine API.

author: ajsutton
content: Last call we said we'd be really strict about actually hitting milestones to make progress clear but we seem to be abandoning that as well. It's really hard for the community to get a proper sense of progress if we keep setting out milestones then skipping ahead even when not everything is done. Makes it look like we're more ready than we are and then people are surprised when suddenly there's delays.
